Hi Katie,

Confirming we have updated the pages.

https://acoufelt.co.uk/solution/framework-ceiling-frames/
  • Can you just update bim to ‘BIM’. Needs to be capitalised. (DONE)

https://acoufelt.co.uk/solution/layered-ceiling-baffles/
  •  Can you add the BIM files under the 2D images (DONE)

http://acoufelt.co.uk/resources/
  • Can you add back in clouds under ceiling, didn’t need to be removed. (DONE)

Pages are now published and Menu has been updated as well

Hi Joel, Looks awesome thank you! Framework - Can you just update bim to 'BIM'. Needs to be capitalised. Layered - Can you add the BIM files under the 2D images (Have attached files and design) Resources
  • Can you add back in clouds under ceiling, didn't need to be removed.
I have attached an image of the navigation as to where these pages sit. Once these changes have been made I'm happy for them to be pushed live! Thanks! Warm regards, Katie Kenna Marketing Coordinator - EMEA T: +44 (0) 203 488 6322 Level 1, 1 Old Street, London, EC1V 9HL, UK acoufelt.com

Hi Katie,

We have updated the pages. Framework and Layered pages are still in private so you need to be logged in to view the page.

https://acoufelt.co.uk/solution/framework-ceiling-frames/
  • Technical Drawings added to the page

https://acoufelt.co.uk/solution/layered-ceiling-baffles/
  • Added the 44 colours

https://acoufelt.co.uk/resources/
  • Remove Ceiling Products > Clouds and Ceiling Products > Baffles
  • Add Ceiling Products > Frames
  • Add Ceiling Products > Layered Ceiling Baffles

Let me know if this is ok for you to live? also can you send us the structure of the menu and where to add the Framework and Layered Baffles

Hi Katie,

I hope all is well, noted on the request changes, we will update you shortly.

Just one more change, can we update the colour swatch on the layered baffles page to include all of our 44 colours.

Thanks!

Hi Joel, Looking great! Can we make these few tweaks then push them live Framework - Can you add the technical drawing drop down under the 3D icons (have attached the design layout and files)
  • Can you add 'Frames' as a section to the technical resources page (have attached design layout)
  • Can we please have it added to the UK navigation
Layered Baffles
  • Can we add the CAD and REVIT files under the 2D line drawings mirroring the standard baffle page. (Files attached)
  • Can we add 'Layered Ceiling Baffles' as a drop down on the resources page (design attached)
  • Can we please have it added to the UK navigation
Resources Page
  • Can I also get 'Baffles' category removed from the resources page. There should only be Standard Baffle Range and Layered Baffle Range.
If you have any questions/need clarification please let me know! Thanks! Warm regards, Katie Kenna Marketing Coordinator - EMEA T: +44 (0) 203 488 6322 Level 1, 1 Old Street, London, EC1V 9HL, UK acoufelt.com
